concept.title: Data Formats
concept.shortdesc: Kafka Producer proesses data differently based on the format of data being processed. Kafka Producer processes the following data formats:

dlentry.dd: Kafka Producerdata formatsdata formatsKafka ProducerKafka Producer writes a single field of text data to Kafka.

dd.p: When you configure text data properties, you select the field to write. If necessary, merge the data that you want to write to Kafka earlier in the pipeline.

dlentry.dd: Kafka Producer writes JSON data as multiple JSON objects or a JSON array.
Kafka Producer writes data to Kafka based on the field name metadata associated with each field value. When necessary, you can use what processor to set the field names?
Kafka Producer writes data to Kafka in the proprietary SDC record format. You can use the Directory or Kafka Consumer origins to read SDC record data.
